sentence.value: He was selected as cosmonaut on May 5, 1967, and retired on September 7, 1994.

sentence.value: Lyakhov was the Commander on Soyuz 32, Soyuz T-9 and Soyuz TM-6, and spent 333 days, 7 hours, 47 minutes in space.
